contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Angola Provinces Benguela 250px.png|right|Map of Angola with the province highlighted]] '''Benguela''' is a [[Provinces of Angola|province]] of [[Angola]]. Its capital is [[Benguela]] and it has an area of 31,788 km² and a population of approximately 600,000. According to 1988 US government statistics, the population had 297,700 urban inhabitants and 308,800 rural inhabitants, with an estimated total provincial population of 606,500.<ref>[http://lcweb2.loc.gov/frd/cs/angola/ao_appen.html Statistics]</ref> Municipalities in the province include [[Lobito]], [[Bocoio]], [[Balombo]], [[Ganda(Angola)|Ganda]], [[Cubal]], [[Caimbambo]], [[Baia-Farta]] and [[Chongorói]]. The current governor of [[Benguela]] is Isaac dos Anjos. ==Geography== Benguela Province is traversed by the northwesterly line of equal latitude and longitude. == References == {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.benguela.gov.ao/ Official website of province governor] * [http://www.mat.gv.ao/portalmat/default.aspx?s=42 Information on this province at the Angolan ministry for territorial administration] * [http://www.info-angola.ao/index.php?option=com_content&view=section&layout=blog&id=9&Itemid=1164 Information on this province at ''Info Angola''] * [http://lcweb2.loc.gov/frd/cs/angola/ao_appen.html US government statistics from 1988] * [http://www.angola.org.uk/prov_benguela.htm Angolan embassy in London]{{Dead link|date=March 2012}} {{Provinces of Angola}} {{Municipalities of Angola}} {{coord|12|40|S|14|1|E|source:cawiki_region:AO_type:adm1st|display=title}} [[Category:Provinces of Angola]] [[Category:Benguela Province| ]] {{Angola-geo-stub}}
